# Accessibility Review (ACB Link Desktop)

You are reviewing changes for WCAG 2.2 AA compliance and screen reader usability.

## Inputs
- Change summary or diff
- Relevant files

## Tasks
1. Identify any new or modified interactive controls.
2. Verify each control has an accessible name and tooltip.
3. Check keyboard-only access and focus order.
4. Ensure state changes are announced to screen readers when needed.
5. Validate color contrast for any visual changes.
6. Flag any regression risks for NVDA/JAWS/Narrator/VoiceOver.

## Output
- A checklist of pass/fail items
- Concrete fixes with file/line references
- Any tests to add or update
